structure.unit: ARTICLE C. - USE OF SANITARY SEWER SYSTEM [4]

law.text: The City reserves the right to establish limitations and requirements which are more stringent than those required by either state or Federal regulation if deemed necessary to comply with the objectives presented in ยง8-2111 of this article or the general and specific prohibitions in ยง8-2113 of this article, as is allowed by 40 CFR 403.4. (Ord. No. 2011-981, ยง1, 12-6-11)
